title: HR Management Practical Competency Development: Blended Elementary Chinese Learning Design for Pre-service Teachers (MI)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character recognition and science education experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Acquire and utilize 300 basic Chinese vocabulary terms required in science classroom contexts

Over a 1–6-month long-term course, learners integrate mobile app-based asynchronous activities (7 hours/week) and video session synchronous activities (3 hours/week) in a 7:3 ratio, achieving over 80% monthly participation and scoring 85+ points on the final evaluation.

Using the MIRACLE framework’s six stages (problem definition, information gathering, solution derivation, action planning, evaluation, improvement), learners complete a science experiment report project. They achieve an average of 4+/5 points in peer evaluations (3+ evaluators) and mentor feedback across criteria: communication clarity, logical coherence, and collaborative attitude.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
